title: Deluxe Queen
seo_title: Deluxe Queen Rooms in Lower Manhattan | The Frederick
excerpt: Deluxe Queen Room Rooms at the Frederick Hotel offer one double bed and accommodate up to two guests. Standard services and amenities are included.
description: Deluxe Queen Room Rooms at the Frederick Hotel offer one double bed and accommodate up to two guests. Standard services and amenities are all included.
amenities_list:
• One queen bed
  • Accommodates up to two guests
  • Complimentary Wi-Fi
  • Work Desk
  • Flat-screen TV
  • Hair Dryer
  • C.O. Bigelow bath amenities
  • Frette luxury linens and towels
  • iPod docking station
  • Cordless telephone
  • Valet Laundry
  • Movies on-demand
  • Iron and ironing board
  • Current copy of Time Out Magazine
  • In room safe
